3.Subject: WARNING
3.Content:
FOR YOUR EYES ONLY

Colonel Spencer Hunter Stewart,

The previous message was intended as a component of Strategic Readiness Exercise "Overwhelming Force '91." Regrettably, there has been an error. Instead of transmitting the designated simulated activation code, an actual code was transmitted. We must assume that the Dead Hand system has been activated.

The exercise has been terminated and the personnel at NORAD are taking immediate action to secure the deactivation code. As the designated code entry operator, you are essential to this effort.

I will expedite transmission of the deactivation code to your location.

2.Subject: ORDER NO. 121
2.Content:
FOR YOUR EYES ONLY

Colonel Spencer Hunter Stewart,

Multiple ICBM launches have been detected from Soviet Union-based launch sites. NORAD is in the process of evaluating the situation. The President is enroute to the Looking Glass plane and will soon assume command. Meanwhile, a DEFCON 2 alert has been sounded across all branches of the US Armed Forces and activation of the Dead Hand system has been authorized.

You are directed to immediately input the activation code USAF-17GF-1AFD-SU22 and stand by for further directives.

God Bless America.

7.Subject: SITREP 1
7.Content:
SITREP:

There's been a catastrophic computer blunder at NORAD and we're sure as hell it led to the real activation code being sent instead of a mock one. The folks over at NORAD are currently working around the clock to restart their entire network, so who knows how long that'll take.

But, one of the sharp officers over here had the bright idea to jot down the latest delay code just in case - breaking just about every safety protocol in the book. Thank God he did.

The code is: USAF-DELA-4200-6900. Enter it ASAP, you're our last hope to buy us some time. I'll keep you updated as more information becomes available.

10.Subject: SITREP 2
10.Content:
SITREP: 
Colonel, the situation here is dire. The techies at NORAD are struggling to get the system back online, and it's a slow process.

It's making me nostalgic for the "bomber gap" days. Feels like we're getting old.

But don't you let that happen, Colonel. Keep your eye on Dead Hand like it's the last thing you'll ever see. Because for you and 6 billion others, it might just be. I'll keep you informed as things develop.

EndingLaunchText:
EPILOGUE: 

[Clipping from propaganda newspaper distributed in USA]

SEPTEMBER 1ST 1996, TRENCH NEAR BERLIN

As we enter the fourth year of stalemate on the eastern front, and as the global community gets the real idea of the scale of devastation from the nuclear attacks of ‘92, many people around the world ask the same questions - could this have been prevented? How did that even come to be? 

Yesterday I might come to what are some possible answers. As probably everyone knows, with the diminishing numbers of men and women fit to serve in armed forces, many of the NATO countries had decided to use some of the military prison population to hold off the Soviet advance on one of many trenches on the German frontline. 

These men and women have their chance to atone for their many crimes in this just and unprovoked war against communism. And one of these men is private Spencer Hunter Stewart, a 38 years old member of “Easy” penal company, who claimed to be an operator of a mysterious “Dead Hand” computer, which failure led to the start of the nuclear war. Oh, and that he has been “scapegoated” for the failure, and is totally innocent of any crimes he was accused of.

His sergeant, however, says that it could be no further from the truth. Spencer Hunter Stewart used to be logistics officer in USMC (Stewart claimed to be USAF officer) who was convicted of defrauding taxpayers money during his service, and imprisoned months before an unprovoked and not very effective Soviet nuclear attack against the United States happened. He is also famous for being a con man involved within many pyramid schemes, and his words, while indeed entertaining, should be taken with a massive grain of salt.

Citizens who read this at home should take one thing to their heart. While our brave men and women from US Armed forces, and Allied countries fight (and will soon win) on the frontline, the communist lies will try to infiltrate hearts and minds of those on homefront. Anyone who is trying to sow seeds of panic and doubt or misinformation about scale of radiation or devastation in mainland US or any of the Allied countries should be immediately reported to the nearest MP, police or FBI officer. Martial law must be respected at all times, because our enemy never sleeps.

From the frontline,
Ben Shaw

Scenario name: Test gone wrong
This scenario has one more ending
Written by kszaku (a.k.a damoch) in February 2023

Thanks for playing Dead Hand
EndingShutdownText:
EPILOGUE:

TOP SECRET - FOR YOUR EYES ONLY
FROM: President George Herbert Walker Bush
TO: General George Lee Butler 

July 10, 1991

General,

The incident of July 7 should never happen. It is a miracle that the worst has not come to be, and we have not experienced nuclear annihilation. It is also unthinkable that such a massive disaster would happen because of a computer glitch. 

With that in mind I order you to deactivate the Dead Hand system once and for all. Every installation that is in any way linked to that system is to be disabled once and for all, and scrapped or destroyed. All documentation that even mentions that system must be destroyed as well, if that means the necessity for replanning of our nuclear strategy, that is for the better.

All personnel that were responsible for that system, will be moved to other posts, and must sign the NDA’s. They are not allowed to talk about “Dead Hand”, and they will take the knowledge about that system to their graves.

As for the man responsible for regaining the control over the “Dead Hand” system, Colonel Spencer Hunter Stewart, forward him my personal gratitude, and offer whatever material possession he pleases and then discharge him from service. If he opposes, he will be dealt with by usual means.

God Bless America.

With Regards,
President of the United States of America
George H.W. Bush

Scenario name: Test gone wrong
This scenario has one more ending
Written by kszaku (a.k.a damoch) in February 2023

Thanks for playing Dead Hand
